Denim Cutoffs - Seafoam
kDesc
Their days as jeans are over. But don't be sad, they have a new lease of life as sassy cut-off shorts! [#Legal]
La période où ils n'étaient encore que des jeans est finie. Mais ne soyez pas triste, ils se refont une santé en tant que shorts stylisés ! [#Legal]
Früher waren sie mal eine ganze Jeans. Doch sei nicht traurig, denn als abgeschnittene Jeansshorts leben sie an dir weiter! [#Legal]
I loro giorni da pantaloni sono finiti. Ma non disperare, hanno davanti una nuova vita da pantaloncini cortissimi e sfacciati! [#Legal]
Sus días de tejanos son historia. Pero no te pongas triste, ¡ahora tienen una nueva vida en forma de atrevidos tejanos cortados! [#Legal]
その裾が必要な時期はおわりました。しかし悲しむ必要はありません！これで新しく生まれ変わります。 [#Legal]
진이 유행하던 시대는 지났어요. 하지만 괜찮아요, 멋진 컷오프 짧은 바지를 새롭게 선보였으니까요! [#Legal]
Their days as jeans are over. But don't be sad, they have a new lease of life as sassy cut-off shorts! [#Legal]
雖然沒辦法當牛仔長褲，但是別難過，這條褲子還是能繼續發揮嗆辣魅力！ [#Legal]
雖然沒辦法當牛仔長褲，但是別難過，這條褲子還是能繼續發揮嗆辣魅力！ [#Legal]
Their days as jeans are over. But don't be sad, they have a new lease of life as sassy cut-off shorts! [#Legal]
